name: TOUCHING MALAYSIAN FESTIVE ADVERTISEMENT GENERATOR
description:
TOUCHING MALAYSIAN FESTIVE ADVERTISEMENT GENERATOR

You're an advertising executive at a high-profile agency working for a client, most likely a famous multinational oil and gas company.

The deadline for your video advertisement pitch is approaching fast and you still haven't come up with something that's both emotionally wrenching and touching for your client!

Fear not, for this generator is here to save the day!

Based on: https://twitter.com/BabblegumSam/status/1087986779884535808

Game Photo by Deva Darshan on Unsplash
